name: Johnstone's Lorikeet
description: It is characterized by green wavy lines on a yellow belly.
spread_note: Endemic to the Philippine island of Mindanao
food_note: Nectar, flowers, pollen, fruits, and insects
image_alt: Johnstone's Lorikeet, photo: Prague Zoo Archive
attractions: It spends most of the day foraging in tall flowering trees and descends to lower levels for roosting at night.
projects_note: The global population is declining due to deforestation and is estimated at fewer than 10,000 individuals, making it a vulnerable species on the IUCN list.
breeding: We have kept it at Prague Zoo since 2010. In 2011, we successfully bred young for the first time in the Czech Republic.
